price: Kamar haka ake karkatar da waɗanda suka kasance sunã jãyayya game da ãyõyin Allah.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
